name: "Bug Fix PR"

## Summary

- What was broken and the observed behavior.

## Linked Issue

- Fixes `#<issue-number>`

## Root Cause Analysis

- Brief explanation of the root cause.

## Fix Description

- How this change addresses the root cause.

## Reproduction

- Before fix: steps to reproduce the bug.
- After fix: steps to verify the fix.

## Tests

- Added/updated tests and how to run them.

## Risk / Impact

- Potential side effects, performance implications, or areas touched.

## Screenshots / Logs (if applicable)

- Evidence of the failure and the fix.

## Checklist

- [ ] I followed the guidelines in [CONTRIBUTING.md](../../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] Reproduction steps included and verified
- [ ] Tests added/updated and pass locally
- [ ] Linters/formatters pass
- [ ] Backports or forward-ports considered (if needed)
